cyclone.name: IAN
cyclone.current_location: about 255 mi (410 km) south of Kingston, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to turn northwest and then north-northwest, moving near or over western Cuba late Monday, then emerging into the southeastern Gulf of Mexico Tuesday and continuing north toward the Florida peninsula/Gulf Coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch/Warning limited to Cayman Islands; no watches along U.S. East Coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for Grand Cayman; Tropical Storm Watch for Little Cayman and Cayman Brac
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Jamaica, Cayman Islands, western Cuba, Florida Keys and Florida peninsula (potentially later Georgia/South Carolina coasts)
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤3%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds by late next week
weather_observation.rainfall: Only light peripheral rain bands possible late next week; heavy rainfall not expected at present
weather_observation.other_hazards: None currently anticipated for port operations
